Articles.Content:
Hai, Im Mrab Ezreb. I am now streaming at twitch and uploading to youtube videos about ksp. Check me out plz! twitch.tv/MrabEzreb/profile (You can find my YT from there) I haven't done any videos yet, but I plan to! I have been streaming. All day in fact!

Thanks! - Mrab Ezreb

Welcome to the forums MrabEzreb!

But sorry, no vote. I think both media have their pros and contras. In my opinion it depends on what you are planing to present and how.

See you around!

I prefer YouTube; it doesn't take as long to buffer. But that's just me.

And yes, welcome!
Twitch has never failed me (apart from the odd league of legends overload/ddos). :-)

YouTube.

Reason being...For KSP, people watch youtube to learn, then they watch Twitch to get ideas/entertainment.
I've never heard of Twitch, does that make me old?

I voted YouTube not because I think it's "better" or anything, but because it matches more my style both of watching and producing.

I'm sure Twitch has its uses, just none for me.

Welcome to the forums MrabEzreb!

But sorry, no vote. I think both media have their pros and contras. In my opinion it depends on what you are planing to present and how.

See you around!

this will never be resolved
